arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings vs West Brom as Roberts wins it at the death
arts.sum: The Bristol City stopper would have had his heart in his mouth when his short pass was intercepted by Callum Styles in the first half but luckily, the Baggies man passed the ball straight back to him. He remains the best crosser of the ball in this City squad currently and on another day could have had an assist or two by half-time.

arts.ttl: Haydon Roberts’ late winner boosts Bristol City’s play-off hopes
arts.sum: Alex Mowatt had cancelled out Nahki Wells’ opener, while Jayson Molumby was sent off in the 89th minute.

arts.ttl: 'It had to be done' - Ex-Bristol Rovers striker details story behind shock Bristol City switch
arts.sum: Every player wants to reach the Premier League, but for me the Championship felt like the Premier League because I’d been playing in front of 100 fans a few years earlier.” The striker scored a combined 48 league goals within two seasons, including two against his former side in the National League play-offs, as Rovers earned back-to-back promotions.

arts.ttl: Bristol City predicted team vs West Brom as Manning faces selection dilemma
arts.sum: While Mamadou Dombia ensured it was far from straightforward for the Robins, first-half goals from Ross McCrorie and Nahki Wells proved to be enough to see City over the line and into the Championship play-off places. If the weekend's meeting with Watford was the start of crunch time, it is hard to find the words to describe just how big this evening's meeting with West Brom is in Bristol City's campaign.

arts.ttl: Why West Brom fans can play vital role in grieving family's search for answers, writes IAN HERBERT
arts.sum: IAN HERBERT: It's been more than six months since Steve Townsend lost his brother, Mark, but the pain lingers. It was etched across his face when I saw him at a coroner's court in Sheffield last week.

arts.ttl: Liam Manning shares simple response to questions around George Earthy's Bristol City future
arts.sum: Liam Manning has shared a simple response to questions about George Earthy's future at Bristol City beyond the end of his loan spell at Ashton Gate, admitting the Reds will "see in the summer" what happens with the attacking midfielder. George Earthy played an important role as Bristol City secured a crucial 2-1 win over Watford at Ashton Gate

arts.ttl: Scott Twine, Ross McCrorie, Joe Williams: Bristol City team news ahead of West Brom visit
arts.sum: Liam Manning has admitted it is possible that Scott Twine could be in contention to feature for Bristol City in their clash with West Brom after the attacking midfielder missed the Robins' win over Watford with a groin injury. Scott Twine, Ross McCrorie, Joe Williams: Bristol City team news ahead of West Brom visit

arts.ttl: Neil Harris makes Josh Stokes claim as Bristol City loanee nears end of Cambridge loan spell
arts.sum: Cambridge United boss Neil Harris has claimed he believes Josh Stokes is in a position to push his way into the Bristol City squad next season as he nears the end of his loan spell with the U's. Bristol City loanee Josh Stokes has scored six goals in 27 League One appearances for Cambridge United this season
